text: Papers We Love Education, the computer science education focused chapter of Papers We Love, is back again next week, 24th March, 5pm UTC, at <http://twitch.tv/twilioquest|twitch.tv/twilioquest>. This time with a presentation of “First Year Programming: Let All the Flowers Bloom”. All the info and a link to the paper here: <https://github.com/papers-we-love/edu/discussions/4>
